PAD.synopsis: Deep grooves in stones and ground - accompanied by clacking sounds. These were created by hook horrors. A player who passes a Survival check (and Underdark races) willrecognise something is marking its territory. (but does not recognise it as a hook horror, since that would contradict the VB when you see the hook horror. See UND_HookHorrors_VB)

PAD_1.speaker: Player
PAD_1.text: Sharp, deep... and still fresh. Some monster did this, marking its territory.
